resources.string: Students of NIT Trichy are advised to use official college email
Keep checking back for exciting and engaging events with attractive prizes!
Update to the new app to have a seamless experience.

RULES:
● Submit the correct answer to proceed to the next level.
● Players will be ranked based on points they score.
● Points are calculated as follows :
 ○ Solving a question in level 1 awards the player with 10 points.
 ○ Solving a question in levels 2 and 3 awards the player with 20 points.
 ○ Solving a question in levels 4 and 5 awards the player with 30 points.
 ○ For each question an additional hint will be given, if any player takes the help of the additional hint to solve the question, then that player will be awarded with only half of the points.

 SUBMISSION INSTUCTIONS:
● All the words in an answer must be in lowercase and separated by a space.
● If the answer is a group of words(strings), then enter the answer as "word1 word2 word3" i.e. each string separated by a space. Ex: “programming language”
● If the answer contains a group of words and any number of separate real values, enter the answer as "word integer". Ex: “ubuntu 19.04”
● If the answer is an integer or real number then enter the answer simply as “1234” or “123.45”

ALL THE BEST!
Are you sure you want to use the additional hint?
You will be awarded with only half of the points upon solving.
